com.clxcommunications.xms.api

Class GroupCreate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clxcommunications.xms.api.GroupCreate

  • @Value.Immutable
public abstract class GroupCreate
extends Object
    A class describing parameters available during group creation. Groups can be used within XMS to organize message recipients and easily send batch messages to all members but referring to the group identifier as message recipient.

      A builder of group creation descriptions.
